Sounds like you work for verant

----- Original Message -----
From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 12:01 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible cheat... Off topic - Longish


> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> there own server? could you give me(us) more information about this
please?
> hehehe...it'd be neato to have my own server for just me and my friends
;)
> no $10/mo either.
>
> hmmm...interesting...
>
> please give me all the info you can or point me somewhere where I can get
> the info.
>
> thanks,
> Omeg
>
> PS..could they interact with NPCs at all or just walk around?
>
> >Why is everyone assuming that the datastream is encrypted? Within
> >a month of attempting it another group had an everquest *SERVER*
>emulator
> >that was able to have a client walk around the world and see >monsters
that
> >they spawned. Surely you don't think they had time to >break ANY
encoding
> >and *STILL* be able to analyize the protocol to >the point of having a
> >working server do you?
>
